title: I hope this counts as a player creation
body: I created the idea for this Zac q rework where instead of just slowing instead it sort of knocks people to the side and slows them like Draven does, this makes it more realistic.

replies.body:
You'd have to change the E then, to make it not knock up. Imagine initiating with E, knocking them up, then hitting them with Q, knocking them to the side. Thats too much CC and makes him too obnoxious, as both moves interrupt the enemy.

I think it would be better for the "knock them to the side" CC to only apply to minions and monsters.
